title: Nakado Riku Animation: Hijouyou Mochidashi Bukuro wo Youi Shiyou
original_name: 中通りく アニメーション 非常用持ち出し袋を用意しよう
sinopse: For the 8th anniversary of the Great East Japan Earthquake, Fukushima Prefecture support character Nakado Riku and her friends teach us how to prepare an earthquake survival kit.
